body.p: This glossary is extracted from the International Financial Reporting Standards and International Accounting Standards that are published in this edition. These Standards were issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (Board) or its predecessor, the International Accounting Standards Committee. References are by Standard and paragraph number or Standard and appendix letter.

variants.p: The glossary also contains extracts from the Conceptual Framework for Financial Reporting (the Conceptual Framework). References to the Conceptual Framework are preceded by CF.

body.p: References set out in (brackets) indicate minor variations in wording.
